title: Zeabur AI
introduction: Zeabur offers a range of plans designed to help you deploy static websites, serverless functions, and containerized services efficiently, saving you time and money.
features: Up to 4 vCPU and 16GB memory for each container
targetPeople: Developers and teams looking to deploy static websites, serverless functions, and containerized services
